nodes.text: Palliduvans were a near-human species characterized by their lanky frames, chalk-white skin, and long, bony fingers used to draw blood. Palliduvans included the bounty hunter Aurra Sing and the pirate Valik.

Palliduvans first appeared in the 1999 film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, the first installment of the Star Wars prequel trilogy. They were first identified in the 2019 episode guide for "The Doza Dilemma," an episode of the television series Star Wars Resistance.
In Star Wars Legends, Aurra Sing was a hybrid of a Human and near-Human species.
